00034 #ifndef GPIO_H
00035 #define GPIO_H
00036 
00037 
00038 /* Register Definitions */
00039 #define GPIO_ID_REG       0x00
00040 #define GPIO_SCRATCH      0x04
00041 #define GPIO_LED16SEG     0x08
00042 #define GPIO_DIPSW        0x0a
00043 #define GPIO_CNTRCTRL     0x0c
00044 #define GPIO_CNTRVAL      0x10
00045 #define GPIO_CNTRRELOAD   0x14
00046 #define GPIO_DMAREQ       0x18
00047 #define GPIO_WR_CNTR      0x1c
00048 #define GPIO_RD_CNTR      0x20
00049 
00050 // Interrupt controller is in GPIO block
00051 #define INTRCTL_ID_REG     0x100
00052 #define INTRCTL_CTRL       0x104
00053 #define INTRCTL_STATUS     0x108
00054 #define INTRCTL_ENABLE     0x10c
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 // DownCounter Control Reg Bit Defs
00059 #define CNTR_RUN     1
00060 #define CNTR_RELOAD  2 
00061 #define CNTR_INTR_EN 4    // enable interrupt when count reaches 0 (not implemented)
00062 
00063 
00064 // DMA Req/Ack Reg Bit Defs
00065 #define DMA_REQ_WR  1
00066 #define DMA_REQ_RD0 2
00067 #define DMA_REQ_RD1 4
00068 #define DMA_REQ_RD2 8
00069 #define DMA_REQ_RD3 0x10
00070 
00071 #define DMA_ACK_WR  0x0100
00072 #define DMA_ACK_RD0 0x0200
00073 #define DMA_ACK_RD1 0x0400
00074 #define DMA_ACK_RD2 0x0800
00075 #define DMA_ACK_RD3 0x1000
00076 
00077 
00078 // Interrupt Controller Reg Bit Defs
00079 #define INTRCTL_OUT_ACTIVE 0x01
00080 #define INTRCTL_TEST_MODE  0x02
00081 #define INTRCTL_OUTPUT_EN  0x04
00082 #define INTRCTL_INTR_TEST1 0x0100
00083 #define INTRCTL_INTR_TEST2 0x0200
00084 #define INTRCTL_TEST1_EN   0x0001
00085 #define INTRCTL_TEST2_EN   0x0002
00086 #define INTRCTL_DOWN_COUNT_EN          0x0020
00087 #define INTRCTL_INTR_DOWN_COUNT_ZERO   0x0020
00088 
00089 #define INTRCTL_INTR_WR_CHAN 0x0001
00090 #define INTRCTL_INTR_RD_CHAN 0x0002
00091
